question: Which are the only two nations that form the habitat for the "Goliath Frog".?
explanation: Goliath Frog is the largest living frog on the earth. It is also known as Goliath Bullfrog or Giant Slippery Frog. Its scientific name is Conraua goliath. Its habitat is small which is restricted to Cameroon and Equatorial Guinea. Its conservation status is classified as "Endangered" according to the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Major threats facing by this species are habitat destruction, food and pet trade.
